name: cucumberautocomplete
author: Alexander Krechik
description: VSCode Cucumber (Gherkin) Full Language Support + Formatting + Autocomplete

cucumberautocomplete.steps.description: Path or array of glob-style-pathes to the steps files

cucumberautocomplete.pages.description: Object, which consists of 'page name' => 'page object file path' pairs

cucumberautocomplete.syncfeatures.description: Will get steps using count from glob-style path or from '**/*.feature' if true

cucumberautocomplete.strictGherkinComple.description: Strict comparing of declaration func and gherkin word (ex. show only steps, declared via 'When()' func for the 'When ' string

cucumberautocomplete.strictGherkinValida.description: Compare step body and gherkin word during steps validation

cucumberautocomplete.smartSnippets.description: Change all the parts, that requires some user input (like .*, ([a-z]+), \w{1,3}) to snippets

cucumberautocomplete.stepsInvariants.description: Show all the 'or' steps parts as separate suggestions (ex. show `I use a` and `I use b` steps suggestions for the `I use (a|b)` step

cucumberautocomplete.customParameters.description: Change some steps RegEx parts depending on array of 'parameter' - 'value' key pairs. Parameter could be string or RegEx object

cucumberautocomplete.skipDocStringsForma.description: Skip format of strings, that placed between ''' or """ strings

cucumberautocomplete.formatConfOverride.description: Override some formatting via format conf strings = {[key: String]: num | 'relative'}, where key - beggining of the string, num - numeric value of indents

cucumberautocomplete.onTypeFormat.description: Enable ontype formattings (activating after pressing on space, @ and : keys)

cucumberautocomplete.gherkinDefinitionPa.description: Provide step definition name part of regex(ex. '@(given|when|then|step)\(' in case of python-like steps. Please ensure, that they are placed in regex match '()' braces

cucumberautocomplete.stepRegExSymbol.description: Provide step regex symbol. Ex. it would be "'" for When('I do something') definition

cucumberautocomplete.pureTextSteps.description: Using steps definitions as a text strings with custom cucumber expressions support

scripts.postinstall: cd gclient && npm install && cd ../gserver && npm install && cd ..
